data.question: What is the critical temperature (Tc) of MnII(TCNE)3/2(I3)1/2 at ambient pressure?
What property of V[TCNE]x makes it a candidate for 'spintronic' applications?
data.answer: Its valence and conduction bands are spin-polarized.

data.question: Does Mn[TCNE]3/2(I3)1/2 exhibit stronger or weaker spin coupling compared to V[TCNE]x?
True or False: Mn[TCNE][C4(CN)8]1/2 exhibits significant dispersive susceptibility above 50 K.
What is the Tc of Mn[TCNE][C4(CN)8]1/2?
True or False: The magnetic behavior of [Fe[TCNE](NCMe)2][FeCl4] is comparable to the 3D coupled Mn[TCNE]3/2(I3)1/2.
What is the role of m4-[TCNE](cid:2)(cid:3) in the structure of MnII[TCNE]3/2(I3)1/2?
data.answer: It bridges the MnII ions both between and within the layers.

data.question: True or False: Mn[TCNE]3/2(I3)1/2 and Mn[TCNE][C4(CN)8]1/2 have the same structural motif.
What is the significance of the angle between intra- and interlayer Mnâ€“N bonds in MnII[TCNE]3/2(I3)1/2?
data.answer: It permits the m4-[TCNE](cid:2)(cid:3) to bridge the corrugated layers.

data.question: True or False: The magnetic ordering of Mn[TCNE]3/2(I3)1/2 is attributed to antiferromagnetic coupling.
What happens to the Tc of Mn[TCNE]3/2(I3)1/2 under the application of moderate pressure?
True or False: Mn[TCNE][C4(CN)8]1/2 exhibits a transition to another magnetic state below 50 K.
What is the role of the m4-[C4(CN)8]2(cid:3) species in Mn[TCNE][C4(CN)8]1/2?
data.answer: It bridges the layers leading to dominant antiferromagnetic behavior.

data.question: True or False: The magnetic properties of Mn[TCNE][C4(CN)8]1/2 are attributed to antiferromagnetic coupling between two interpenetrating ferromagnetic lattices.
What is the saturation magnetization of Mn[TCNE]3/2(I3)1/2 at 10 K?
True or False: Mn[TCNE][C4(CN)8]1/2 exhibits hysteretic behavior with a coercive field.
What is the critical temperature of Mn[TCNE]3/2(I3)1/2 determined by the onset of the low field M(T), Mr(T), or x00(T) data?
What is the significance of the 3D network structure in MnII[TCNE]3/2(I3)1/2?
data.answer: It leads to strong spin coupling, not only within, but also between the layers.

data.question: True or False: The structure of MnII[TCNE]3/2(I3)1/2 suggests a topology for the amorphous room temperature magnets.
What is the role of THF in the composition of MnII[TCNE]3/2(I3)1/2?
data.answer: It resides in channels parallel to the c-axis, but is disordered.
